## Research Question
choose one commercial recommender and describe how you think it works (content-based, collaborative filtering, etc). Does the technique deliver a good experience or are the recommendations off-target?

## The Netflix Recomender System
### System Overview
Over 80% of the content people watch on Netflix is discovered through the service's recommender system, making the system an integral part of the service.
